Name Recipes/Common

Synopsis Solutions for some common tasks.
Details WordCount CallAnalysis StringTemplate CallLifting ColoredTrees
Description
  • CallAnalysis: Analyzing the call structure of an application.
  • CallLifting: Lift procedure calls to component calls.
  • ColoredTrees: Computations on binary trees.
  • StringTemplate: Using string templates to generate code.
  • WordCount: Counting words in strings.
